title: Easter Simnel cake
ingredients: ['200g butter or margarine', '200g light brown sugar', '4 eggs', '225g self raising flour', '225g sultanas', '85g raisins', '110g glace cherries', '3 tablespoons candied mixed peel', 'zest of 1 lemon', 'zest of 1/2 orange', '2 teaspoons mixed spice', '450g golden marzipan']
